name: Guardians: The Last Day of the Citadel - Lite Edition
name_original: Guardians: The Last Day of the Citadel - Lite Edition
description:
"Guardians: The Last Day of the Citadel is BEST ITALIAN APP 2011 - Best Italian game graphics for macitynet.it"


Here it Guardians Lite for free! Don’t miss it! Try to live the Guardians adventure, help the captain Loreena to escape from the Citadel besieged by demons!

Compared to the full version, Guardians LITE allows to play a special level created specifically by the developers to show to the players the exact game mechanics: jumps, slides, swords, duels, and enemies!!

This free version also supports Game Center – although with a limited set of achievements - and includes the opening movie.

You can also get the complete version - for sale on the App Store for only $ 2,99 - straight from the LITE version.
